title: I'm new here...
content:
Howdy! New to the forum. Been designing and art directing for 10 years and moving in the direction of type designing. Yep, I'm that kinda newbie. I'm here to read, absorb and learn as much as I can. Cheers, nice to meet you, and have mercy on me.

[Dribbble](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803011108/http:/dribbble.com/micahmax) / [Instagram](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803011108/http:/instagram.com/micahmax) / [LinkedIn](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803011108/http:/www.linkedin.com/in/micahmax)
author: micahmax

comments.content:
Welcome to our watering hole!
